title: For the recent FPS drops users that have Nvidia
body:
install the newest geforce driver now and see if that was the problem. I am assuming that is my problem. link below talks about how fps was cut in half for some users with last update. After reading more into it, im not sure if the latest update includes fixes for the problems of the last patch.

https://www.techpowerup.com/227881/users-report-multiple-issues-with-geforce-375-86-whql-drivers

replies.body: Seems like my FPS improved a little, but seems like there are few problems left since I got my graphics settings on low.
like ive said. im not even sure if there was an official fix for it with this patch but it is a known problem. this patch was mainly for watchdog 2
just played a game and seems fine now. i guess that was my fix. good luck to everyone else with the problem
